answers.author: Bernie Hayen
answers.text:
Hi Cindy ~
I'm curious....  What specific employment information are you wanting to analyze?  The BLS has a lot of state-by-state data available that is downloadable in an Excel format which makes it very easy to do comparisons and other analyzing.  
Cheers!
Bernie

author: Cindy Margiotta
text: Does anyone know of an off-the-shelf or web based program to access and analyze State ES-202 data?
title: ES-202 Data
